values.user: Read/write access to profile info only. Note: this scope includes user:email and user:follow.
values.user:email: Read access to a user’s email addresses.
values.user:follow: Access to follow or unfollow other users.
values.public_repo: Read/write access to public repos and organizations.
values.repo: Read/write access to public and private repos and organizations.
values.repo:status: Read/write access to public and private repository commit statuses. This scope is only necessary to grant other users or services access to private repository commit statuses without granting access to the code. The repo and public_repo scopes already include access to commit status for private and public repositories respectively.
values.notifications: Read access to a user’s notifications. repo is accepted too.
